title: Learn Cardiology (Offline)
description: If you want to become a cardiologist you should know about basics of it. You have to learn cardiology. And look you are on just a right place. Our app provides you complete beginner to advance cardiology lectures. Anatomy The study of the structure of a plant or animal. Human anatomy includes the cells, tissues, and organs that make up the body and how they are organized in the body. Physiology Physiology is the science of life. It is the branch of biology that aims to understand the mechanisms of living things, from the basis of cell function at the ionic and molecular level to the integrated behaviour of the whole body and the influence of the external environment. This app is specially designed for those who want to learn about heart and its diseases. Our app learn cardiology provides you a complete path for learning cardiology. Cardiology Cardiology is the study and treatment of disorders of the heart and the blood vessels. A person with heart disease or cardiovascular disease may be referred to a cardiologist. Cardiologist A cardiologist specializes in diagnosing and treating diseases of the cardiovascular system. The cardiologist will carry out tests, and they may perform some procedures, such as heart catheterizations, angioplasty, or inserting a pacemaker. Topics cover in the app are given below: - Basics of cardiology - Atrial Fibrillation - Cardiac Rehabilitation - Cardiology Angina - Aortic Aneurysm - Aortic stenosis - Cardiology Bradycardia - Heart Failure - Corona Virus - Coronary Artery Disease - Diabetes - Endocarditis cardiology - Familial Hypercholesterolemia - Flu and you heart - Heart Attack in cardiology - Cancer treatment in cardiology - Cardiology healthy living life. - Stop smoking - Abnormal cholesterol - Blood pressure - Cardiac Arrest in cardiology - Cardio Stroke - Cardiology Supraventricular tachycardia - Female and their heart disease - Heart health and wearable technology - High Triglycerides - Metabolic Syndrome - Mitral Regurgitation - Old people heart disease - Palliative care in cardiology - Renal artery disease - Subclavian - peripheral Artery disease - The Sleep Apnea - Varicose veins - Ventricular tachycardia in cardiology - Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy What does cardiology involve? A cardiologist will review a patient’s medical history and carry out a physical examination. They may check the person’s weight, heart, lungs, blood pressure, and blood vessels, and carry out some tests. An interventional cardiologist may carry out procedures such as angioplasties, stenting, valvuloplasties, congenital heart defect corrections, and coronary thrombectomies. Features in the app - Beautiful design. - Smooth performance. - Bookmark Feature. - Bookmark offline support.
descriptionHTML:
If you want to become a cardiologist you should know about basics of it. You have to learn cardiology. And look you are on just a right place. Our app provides you complete beginner to advance cardiology lectures.

Anatomy
The study of the structure of a plant or animal. Human anatomy includes the cells, tissues, and organs that make up the body and how they are organized in the body.

Physiology
Physiology is the science of life. It is the branch of biology that aims to understand the mechanisms of living things, from the basis of cell function at the ionic and molecular level to the integrated behaviour of the whole body and the influence of the external environment.

This app is specially designed for those who want to learn about heart and its diseases. Our app learn cardiology provides you a complete path for learning cardiology.

Cardiology
Cardiology is the study and treatment of disorders of the heart and the blood vessels. A person with heart disease or cardiovascular disease may be referred to a cardiologist.

Cardiologist
A cardiologist specializes in diagnosing and treating diseases of the cardiovascular system. The cardiologist will carry out tests, and they may perform some procedures, such as heart catheterizations, angioplasty, or inserting a pacemaker.

Topics cover in the app are given below:
- Basics of cardiology
- Atrial Fibrillation
- Cardiac Rehabilitation
- Cardiology Angina
- Aortic Aneurysm
- Aortic stenosis
- Cardiology Bradycardia
- Heart Failure
- Corona Virus
- Coronary Artery Disease
- Diabetes
- Endocarditis cardiology
- Familial Hypercholesterolemia
- Flu and you heart
- Heart Attack in cardiology
- Cancer treatment in cardiology
- Cardiology healthy living life.
- Stop smoking
- Abnormal cholesterol
- Blood pressure
- Cardiac Arrest in cardiology
- Cardio Stroke
- Cardiology Supraventricular tachycardia
- Female and their heart disease
- Heart health and wearable technology
- High Triglycerides
- Metabolic Syndrome
- Mitral Regurgitation
- Old people heart disease
- Palliative care in cardiology
- Renal artery disease
- Subclavian
- peripheral Artery disease
- The Sleep Apnea
- Varicose veins
- Ventricular tachycardia in cardiology
- Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy

What does cardiology involve?
A cardiologist will review a patient’s medical history and carry out a physical examination.
They may check the person’s weight, heart, lungs, blood pressure, and blood vessels, and carry out some tests.
An interventional cardiologist may carry out procedures such as angioplasties, stenting, valvuloplasties, congenital heart defect corrections, and coronary thrombectomies.

Features in the app
- Beautiful design.
- Smooth performance.
- Bookmark Feature.
- Bookmark offline support.
summary: Learn Cardiology. Cardiology tutorials. cardiologists lectures and much more.
